title: @CrabGamer Listen to this
body: Yo my buddy Phil (KingPhilipIV) is sitting here talking all this nonsense about I bought this champ or something like that. He isnt a liar. So yea, good night, merry christmas, and happy halloween.

replies.body: I'm not sure what may have happened, but I've got your buddies account and tickets pulled up now and CrabGamer did repair the account and add the content that was refunded back onto his account. If your buddy doesn't see them, please have him reach back out to us so we can figure out why he's not seeing the right content.
